name: Silent IO - MoonJam 2020
description:
A Game made for The 2020 MoonMoon Game Jam. A space horror extravaganza! make your way through Ichabod station, uncovering the events that unfolded there.

Made by Berji (Programming, Art):

https://www.artstation.com/berji

https://www.instagram.com/andrew.berji/

RatKid (Music, Art & SFX)

https://www.arenblondal.com/

TheWarmiswood (3DAnimation):

https://www.stephenarod.com/
